scripts.test: concurrently -k "cd e2e && npm run webdriverstart" "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm start"  "cd e2e && npm test"
scripts.test:lower: concurrently -k "cd e2e && npm run webdriverstart" "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run start:lower"  "cd e2e && npm test"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run start:lower"
scripts.dev:lower: concurrently -k "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm start"
